Line5.138BED: It's personal with Osric now. He can't stand the thought of one of his charges leaving the faith. He'll never let Edgar walk away.
Line3.138BED: Osric led the group of Inquisitors who accompanied the Knights into Caldeum. He must have been someone important back up North...or had dirt on someone.
VoiceDir1.138BED: She fears Osric, in particular she fears he will kill Edgar.
Line1.138BED: I've never met the man. I just know that Edgar fears him, and Edgar isn't afraid of anything.
